summary: Comprehensive testing completed for PulseFit heart-rate training PWA. Backend APIs fully functional (24/24 tests pass). Frontend delivers complete user experience within single browser session including onboarding, home dashboard, workout management, and navigation. User persistence is session-scoped as expected for browser localStorage behavior.

design_issues.issue: User data persists only within single browser session (localStorage session-scoped)
design_issues.impact: Users must complete onboarding again if they close and reopen browser

Form Input Validation and Data Collection
ND Mode Selection (Standard, ADHD, ASD, Combined)
Profile Information Input (name, age, weight, height, HR settings)
Main GO Button Navigation to Workout
Workout Session Management (start, pause, resume, end)
Real-time Heart Rate Display and Zone Detection
Burn Points Calculation and Progress Tracking
Workout Intensity Controls (easy, moderate, hard, interval)
ADHD Mode Features (Just 5 Minutes button, micro-rewards)

success_percentage.backend: 100% (24/24 tests pass - all endpoints working correctly)
